tradle.FormRequest.tradle.PhotoID: Please click to scan your **ID document**
tradle.FormRequest.tradle.Selfie: Thank you. Now take a '**selfie**' photo of yourself that I can match against your ID document

tradle.Residence.first: Thank you. Now I need you to provide your **residence** information
tradle.Residence.nth: Thank you. Do you have another **residence**? If yes, tap Add, otherwise tap Next

intro.message: Take a quick tour of chat bot?
